alert.note: Alert for Houston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 6:29PM CDT until June 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Houston County in southeastern Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 628 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Maydelle to near Grapeland to 12 miles north of Austonio, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crockett, Austonio, Grapeland, Kennard, Latexo, Weches and Mound City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in League City. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
